website_summaries.verdict: The perfect net for the DIY pool owner who wants to customize his or her backyard fun.
pros: A big, sturdy net that can be cut up, re-tied and still function well for your pool volleyball intentions
Ideal for those with spacious backyards, where pools can accommodate a net that will conjure competition for sure
cons: Basic in the sense it's only a net and does not come with poles or additional pool equipment

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality. Deceptive Description.
customer_reviews.text: Ripped on both sides during first use. Total garbage. You definitely get what you pay for. Plus there is no top cable at all, just a cheap nylon cord. The ties on the sides are also very cheap, slick nylon which makes putting up the net difficult. We had to re-tie many times during the one game we used this, and the eyelet tore on one side after about 20 minutes. Then the other side did the same and just kept tearing more and more until we gave up trying to play. Definitely look elsewhere, and don't be a cheapskate like me, and buy a real net. Luckily they are refunding my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morton

customer_reviews.title: Best value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a full size net better quality than anything you buy from Walmart. We have used it for my large family, and it is very durable. The picture shows sagging, but that is due to my kids lowering it for the littles. This thing can be adjusted with the tensioner cord and stay secured.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not just a volleyball net...
customer_reviews.text: Not using for volleyball, although I’m sure it’s great for that. We’re using it as a barrier fence across our garage when we’re in our garage with the garage door open. It keeps the stinking feral cats from sneaking in when we’re not right there to chase them away. Can’t stand those suckers, and this keeps them out. When they learn to jump over it, I’ll buy another one and stack ‘em...I’m ready....
customer_reviews.author: Susanabanana

customer_reviews.title: These nets were very long, which served our purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: These nets were very long, which served our purpose well. Just wanted others to be advised, this is double the length of any other volleyball net.
customer_reviews.author: sjbzher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Such a disappointment!! The net has a big tear!! Useless. Have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Aminoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and easy to hang
customer_reviews.text: My poles are permanent so we were excited that the net fit perfect and was so easy to hang up. It is a great quality for our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Chris  Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after a couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this net to hang up in our backyard for our kids who are on the volleyball team to practice. They were forewarned to be careful with it as I can tell it wasn’t very durable since some of the strings were already frayed. After only their second time using it the strip on top completely ripped off when one of the kids went up for a spike and accidentally touch the net. there was no way to fix it after that so I just took it off and threw it in the trash. I should’ve heed the warnings of previous reviewers. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Phan

customer_reviews.title: "Cable" is misleading - not a metal cable.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the money, though the statement that it includes high-strength top "cable" is misleading. It's not a metal cable as you would normally see with good volleyball nets, just a thin nylon cord - the same cord that's used for all the ties.
customer_reviews.author: kitcat603

customer_reviews.title: No poles, is just the net.
customer_reviews.text: Ok net for adult sports or kids. No poles included. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Takes a little time to set up but worth the wait.
customer_reviews.text: The net was full size regulation for volleyball. It was very sturdy and allowed for a lot Of children to play at the same time. Awesome buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Robert zeligson

customer_reviews.title: Fits my needs well and got two units for the price of one.
customer_reviews.text: Cut this in two and sewed a new end on each side for two pool nets, because I could not find one in the width I wanted. Really great price, comes with a string for putting up which works well with the saltwater pool, no rust from a cable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Spud's

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle
customer_reviews.text: Great item until it ripped during the first use. Kids were excited to play volleyball with a big net.....during the first game one of the kids ran into the net and it separated the plastic outer edge from the net. Nothing a little duct tape could not fix.
customer_reviews.author: GLN

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my three year old grand daughters tablet. It works great she has dropped it and it has not broken. Its very easy to carry also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: So cheap and thin I haven't even set it up yet bc I live in a windy area and I have an adhd 8 yr old who is the size of a 12 yr old so I really dunno if this will hold up at all. I will probably set it up in a few weeks after the wind dies down. I mean for 7 bucks I knew it wouldn't be great quality, but this is like dollar tree thin. Will update later.
customer_reviews.author: Justthe2ofus

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This net is only really worth it if you're planning on not touching the net at all. The moment the ball hit the net, the corner ripped and the net was untied. If you are like me and are trying to find a net and not sure if this one is worth the money, don't buy it. Spend a little extra on something sturdier. This is just a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Lin

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive product
customer_reviews.text: This net is a nice inexpensive product. There are no defects and all parts were present. The quality is good for the cost ($28). I’m using this as a water volleyball net. Light blowup beach balls will be used. This net ‘may not’ survive long term heavy use as a volleyball net.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered as a replacement net and it looks fine but it’s not super sturdy. The eyelets in the corners started tearing during the first weeks of using it (we only use it one day a week). Still does it’s job and you can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Neiswanger

customer_reviews.title: Still holding up!
customer_reviews.text: We've had the net outside for three months straight now. Still in good shape as it should be.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Spike!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this over our above ground pool. Its doesn't take the abuse of a normal net because we use a light weight ball but so far it Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first game
customer_reviews.text: This net ripped during the first game without even being pulled on. Not sure if the one I got was defective or not, but I am not happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy change out.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter’s a volleyball player and her and some of her teammates I coach on the side and this was an awesome find to fix the old bet I had. Works great and was an easy change out. Thx a lot!! Saved me $$ on having to purchase and entire new set.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Fragile net
customer_reviews.text: It is very fragile. The bet tore on the first day
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: using as a catcher - works great!
customer_reviews.text: Using this as a net to keep my batting off the floor as I quilt so it is almost three times too big but it does the trick
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Mc

customer_reviews.title: Product Quality Not As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: After only our third use of this net, it has a 4-5 inch tear. One of the black net strings also came off after the first or second use. Product description says high performance, strong, etc. Net strength maybe okay for small children but not for older youth or adults.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not very heavy duty quality. The poles that are in for the sides are cheap plastic, didnt even hold up for one weekend. Would not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: SLF

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball net
customer_reviews.text: The product came when expected and as advertised. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Rllamas

customer_reviews.title: Huge net
customer_reviews.text: This thing was huge, looks more like a tennis court type of net, it went around our court and almost covered it double
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Net breaks and rips before even using.
customer_reviews.text: Out of box center net had breaks. Top eye ring rid ripping a hole before even using the net. Would like a new net or refund. I shouldn’t have to uninstall net and ship back. It took me 30 minutes to setup and is defective. I would like a replacement for when it becomes unusable instead of shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: B. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Middle school team keeps sharp at local elementary school grounds

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for our old net! Works like a charm

customer_reviews.title: Nice net and great value
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and seems to be a great net so far. Would highly recommend especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: great for the swimming pool great replacement for your old net

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The net was intended to be for a pool volleyball net but the one I received was for a regular outdoor net. Had to wrap it several time for it to work for me.

customer_reviews.title: Good net at great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great net for the price. I mounted with two wood 2x4s as my posts to hold up. Is nice as a practice net for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Mcwag

customer_reviews.title: Great net for great price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace the old net at my Ward Church building. Worked great!!!

customer_reviews.text: Works for our pool volleyball games. The plastic tubes are not the sturdiest but they work

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t order. This came broken with missing poles. Waste of money.

customer_reviews.text: The side of the net tore the second day it was used. If young kids r using it, it might be ok, but if 18 year old boys r using do not buy this one.

customer_reviews.text: Great net for my 12 year old daughter just starting out for vollyball also great for family get together. It's full sized so be warned it's huge!

customer_reviews.text: Longer than the expected. I needed it for my above ground pool but I managed to use it

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: This was used for badminton by 2 67 year old seniors. It did not hold up to that. It ripped along the stitching seam as if it was perforated after having it just over a month.

customer_reviews.title: Good net
customer_reviews.text: Works great, was able to rig it up to span my pool. Checked out some youtube videos and had a great party.

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than past nets I've gone through. Bigger too. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for a season. Took it down and stored it for the winter. Went to put it up for the spring/summer and it ripped instantly. Very disappointed as I thought I would get at least a few seasons of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Professional grade and sturdy for the price you cannot beat it!

customer_reviews.title: perfect

customer_reviews.title: It works as expected.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Very Long net, enough for like 10 ppl to play

customer_reviews.title: This was a net for pool volleyball, a little ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a net for pool volleyball, a little to large for the pool but we kept it anyway since it was impossible to find a net made just for pool volleyball. We made it work.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

product_meta.title: EastPoint Sports Replacement Volleyball Net with High Strength Cable, Reinforced Side Tapes, and Weather Resistant Material - Poles Not Included
product_meta.description: Color:Original VersionBump, set, and spike! With the EastPoint Sports Volleyball Net, experience a game of volleyball the way it was meant to be played! This official tournament size volleyball net measures 32 feet long for full court indoor and outdoor games. The net itself extends 3 feet high and contains 4 square eyelets for securing the connection ropes. A heavy-duty construction complete with tarpaulin top, side, and bottom tapes ensures that the net will stand tall and proud against weather and rough play. Composed of durable, 6-ply polyethylene mesh material, this net is built tough! The sides are reinforced with dowels to provide additional support, so that the net always stays taught and ready for any game, even over water. Includes 1 volleyball net, 1 top cable, and 4 connection ropes.
feature_bullets: Included Components: 1 Net, Top Cable, 4 Connection Ropes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars569 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
